title: Quarto Live Curl Demo
text:
This repository makes use of the coi-serviceworker to enable Cross-Origin Isolation on a Quarto Website published to GitHub Pages. This enables the use of the {curl} R package with Quarto Live, when combined with a Websocket proxy as described in the webR documentation.
View this document’s source at https://github.com/georgestagg/quarto-live-curl/.

Demo
